data.eml:eml: Forever in the dark: the cave-dwelling azooxanthellate reef coral Leptoseris troglodyta sp. n. (Scleractinia, Agariciidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hoeksema, Bert W. (2012): Forever in the dark: the cave-dwelling azooxanthellate reef coral Leptoseris troglodyta sp. n. (Scleractinia, Agariciidae). ZooKeys 228: 21-37, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.228.3798, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.228.3798
